house_listing.house_description: New home to be built on wonderful treed lot. Plans available for 3 br, 2 bath ranch with garage, gas fireplace, spacious great room & eat-in kitchen. This builder has a great reputation for building a quality product at an affordable price. Will assist with closing costs.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ranch Style, Utility Room
